name: Litter Catcher
description:
My game for the Stop Waiting for Godot game jam! Use the gravity field around you to collect as much on-coming litter as you can in two minutes. Arrow keys to move left/right and space to flip between the bottom and top planes. Be careful with your movements or you may lose some litter!

The physics are definitely a bit more janky than I'd like and I didn't get around to adding any sound/music or making the environment prettier like I wanted, but I'm pretty proud of what I managed to learn and do in a few days.
